p: The data are expressed as the mean ± SEM. The differences among the groups for analgesic and anti-inflammatory activities were analyzed using a one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA). The two-way ANOVA for determinations of differences among the groups for the DPPH and iron chelation activities was followed by the posthoc test using Tukey’s multi-group comparison on GraphPad Prism 8.0.2. The effective concentration (IC 50) was calculated using a nonlinear regression model on GraphPad Prism 8.0.2. The significance value was set at p < 0.05.
